short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block news articles containing specified keywords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "NewsGuardian" – Your Personal News Filter Chrome Extension!

Are you overwhelmed by the flood of news, tired of sifting through articles that don't interest you, or wish to avoid specific topics that trigger stress or anxiety? "NewsGuardian" is here to transform your browsing experience! With our smart Chrome extension, you can easily block out news articles containing certain words or phrases, ensuring your news feed is tailored just for you.

"NewsGuardian" empowers you to customize your news consumption like never before. Whether it's avoiding spoilers for your favorite series, bypassing distressing news topics, or simply focusing on content that matters to you, "NewsGuardian" has got you covered. Our intuitive interface allows you to set up filters in seconds – just type in the words or phrases you want to avoid, and voilà, a personalized news oasis awaits!

But that's not all – "NewsGuardian" is designed with your peace of mind at the forefront. It works quietly in the background, updating your filters in real-time, so you can browse with confidence, knowing you'll only see content that's right for you. Say goodbye to unwanted news and hello to a more enjoyable online experience with "NewsGuardian" – your gatekeeper in the digital world.
